content: {"locationId": "9873", "organizationId": "7964", "name": "BARN Community Center", "address1": "179 Memorial Dr", "address2": "", "city": "Nellis", "state": "WV", "zipCode": "25142", "country": null, "phone": "304-833-2031", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://www.barncommunitycenter.org/", "latitude": "38.1500002", "longitude": "-81.7447304", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution, Hot/Cold Meal Program, Other", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "BARN Community Center is a non-profit organization located in Nellis, WV.  We opened our doors June 2018.  Through faith, we have grown tremendously.  We offer an accessible food pantry and basic needs closet to help stabilize Boone County residents that are in need.  We strive to alleviate some of the stress on individuals and families by creating a welcoming atmosphere where needs are met.  We also offer parent/child activities, a Buddy League / Cheer program for ages Pre-K - 8th grade and a Youth Wrestling program.   Our Mission is to strengthen, empower, and improve Boone County families through recreation, celebration, involvement, support, and access to programs and services to lift our people as a whole.    http://https://www.barncommunitycenter.org/", "notes": "Our facility is open to the public - Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday 9-5 pm.    Our Free \"Hot Meals\" Program is offered on Tuesdays only from 12-5 pm.
